title: mx12.levins
author: mx12.levins
created_time: October 08, 2023, 01:41:08 PMLast edit: May 14, 2024, 04:02:51 PM by mx12.levins
content: Video of my AR(Augmented Reality) Layer for this physical artwork viewable here:https://streamable.com/j6y2rohttps://streamable.com/ebflbk(The full Transmutation NFT animation with audio can be viewed as an Augmented Reality layer over the physical artwork with the free Artivive app.)links with video here: Soon!if the price ticker is not loading then update the link BTC= + (US 50$ Shipping ) + (EU 15$ Shipping)Physical artwork in size 44,6 x 64,6 cmCollectors Edition 3 of 3Zephyr Maiden: Women of the Wind1. - “Zephyr Maiden: Women of the Wind” --- SOLD2. - “Zephyr Maiden: Women of the Wind” --- AVAILABLE3. - “Zephyr Maiden: Women of the Wind” --- AVAILABLEEach Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.LevinsTo claim the special/bonus edition, you will need to own 4 artworks: water, earth, fire and wind edition. This collection will work like a key for/to enter the Altar to claim the fifth artwork of these series.Payment:Payment address Bitcoin: 3CDxDhHppj1Vyjfb771WjUNiS28UvR5EZyPayment address Bitcoin Lightning: nastyrisk78@walletofsatoshi.comZephyr Maiden: Women of the WindIn a world where the winds whispered secrets, there lived a remarkable woman known as the Zephyr Maiden. She had fiery red hair, skin kissed by the green hues of the earth, and eyes that remained closed as if listening to the whispers of the wind.This extraordinary woman was the keeper of the wind's mysteries, drawing her strength and inspiration from its ever-changing currents. She was not like everyone else. She was part of the earth itself, emerging from the very ground beneath her.Surrounded by the swirling winds, the Zephyr Maiden stood with outstretched arms, her body seamlessly merging with the earth around her. Her fingers traced intricate patterns in the air as she summoned the wind's secrets and whispered them to the world. The wind responded by caressing her fiery hair, creating an ethereal symphony that resonated with those who watched in awe.As she danced, a shimmering diamond floated beside her, held aloft by the gentle zephyrs. The diamond was unlike any other, with diamond-shaped structures on its sides that gleamed like the purest of gems. These structures bore a striking resemblance to the logo of Bitcoin, a symbol of the wind's whispers of change that could be harnessed for the betterment of humanity.The Zephyr Maiden's presence was a reminder that nature's forces could coexist with human endeavors. She was a guardian of balance, ensuring that the winds of change blew in harmony with the earth's ancient rhythms.With eyes closed, the Zephyr Maiden continued her dance, her connection to the wind and earth deepening with each passing moment. Her artistry was a tribute to the power of the elements, a testament to the unity of nature and technology, and a symbol of hope for those who sought inspiration in the ever-shifting winds of life._____________________________Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Video Updated! You can also use the ARTIVIVE app to view the animation on a laptop screen.These series are ready to go, with all four elements available for purchase. Keep in mind that to unlock the fifth element, you'll need to collect all four elements. There's just one last water element artwork remaining, so don't miss out!You can purchase the earth, fire, and wind elements, but it's important to note that without the water element, the fifth element won't be unlocked.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: This is one of the masterpieces from my collection. The Earth Element series is historic and will be remembered forever.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: The Wind element, my fourth creation in the series, brought a breath of fresh inspiration. The swirling winds signify change, carrying the spirit of freedom and transformation. Each element unfolds a unique tale, and the Wind edition adds a dynamic twist to this evolving narrative.I want to highlight the ongoing series because I'm currently collaborating on the fifth Element with my sensei. As a reminder, to unlock the special/bonus edition (fifth element), you'll need to possess the four artworks: water, earth, fire, and wind editions. This collection serves as the key to enter the Altar and claim the fifth artwork in the series.And here we go, embarking on a journey of something greater. Creating these artworks took years, and some believed the series would conclude once I finished them. However, there is much more to come than you might think. The process of awakening, bringing all four elements together, will give rise to the fifth element. The questions linge, Who is he? Why must they awaken him? And how did the convergence of all four elements happen? The fifth artwork doesn't signify the end of the story, it's a continuation of the unfolding narrative.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Someone seized them all—the entire Earth Elements series—at the Bitcoin Citadel in Germany! Enchanted by the fire, he was captivated by the series to such an extent that he acquired every piece and now eagerly anticipates the fifth element. With three fire, three water, and so forth, only three sets of the fifth element exist. With 2/3 water already sold, his acquisition of all the initial pieces means that only the complete 3/3 set remains to obtain the fifth element. Otherwise, collectors must trade or assemble the complete series to acquire this masterpiece. He resonated with the essence of these series, understanding the narrative, and now eagerly awaits the fifth element. It was a delight to provide him with these artworks, and I'm certain he'll share an image with all of them together. Thank you and congratulations.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hey everyone,The time has come for the fifth element! I'll be posting about it soon in a special thread. To collect the fifth element, you need to have matching numbers from each of the previous elements I created. The collector who has all the 1/3 numbers is okay with sharing this with the community, but there are still some matching numbers left, specifically, all the 3/3s are still available.For the 2/3 elements, there's a bit of a challenge, you'll need to make offers to the collector through Scarce City, because the Water 2/3 was SOLD at the Bitcoin conference in Miami.So, the fifth element is out there, but the question is: what comes next? Where are the collectors, and why did the four elements awaken this mysterious figure? And who is he? Why does he have this particular color? This is just the very beginning of the series, the story starts now, and there's much more art to come. The Pandora's box is open!Thank you to the collectors and congratulations on acquiring these unique pieces. All of them are interactive, with integrated Bitcoin wallets Looking forward to sharing more soon! BTC
